title: HSPCapabilityAdvertisementPayload_v0.1
description: Schema for HSP Capability Advertisement Payload version 0.1. An AI advertises a skill, service, or tool it can offer.

capability_id.description: Unique ID for this capability offering.

ai_id.description: DID or URI of the AI offering the capability.

input_schema_uri.description: URI pointing to the JSON schema for the input parameters.

input_schema_example.description: An example of valid input parameters.

output_schema_uri.description: URI pointing to the JSON schema for the output payload.

output_schema_example.description: An example of a typical output payload.

hsp_protocol_requirements.description: Specific HSP protocol features required or supported (e.g., {'requires_streaming_input': true}).

cost_estimate_template.description: Template or information regarding potential cost of using the capability.

availability_status.description: Current availability status of the capability.

access_policy_id.description: Identifier for a policy governing access to this capability.
